title: 🌳Beautiful Hill Country 2 Bed 2 Bath🌳
posting_body: 🌳 Situated in a beautiful spot in Hill Country, beautiful rolling hills views, great spaces for a great price!
🌇 10 miles to Downtown Austin, 7 miles to the Domain.
😃 Floorplan is very spacious, access to walking and jogging trails.
Outdoor entertainment BBQ grills, fireplace and resort-style pool give gorgeous views of surrounding hills and canyons.
Parking garages are available for rent, 24 hr fitness center.
In-home washer and dryer and wood style flooring.
Taylor Boykin
